attributes.action: Make it mandatory for people coming into the UK to be quarantined for 14 days.
attributes.additional_details: The Coronavirus is spreading across the world and it is the responsibility of the government and everyone to minimise the spread.
attributes.background: The number of Coronavirus cases in other countries is currently higher than the UK. People returning or coming into the UK may make the situation in the UK worst. Measures should be taken to minimise the spread.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that everyone should stay at home to prevent the spread of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

Decisions to quarantine individuals would be a clinical decision for the NHS, not a matter for the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
